news.title: New An Post stamps honouring Daniel O’Connell designed by David Rooney spark controversy
news.summary: Two new stamps were unveiled by An Taoiseach, Micheál Martin, to mark the 250th Anniversary of the birth of Daniel O’Connell. Created by Hot Press illustrator Dave Rooney, one of the stamps has caused considerable controversy.

news.title: President Higgins releases a statement following the death of Seán Rocks
news.summary: "A public service broadcaster in the truest sense," said President Higgins.

news.title: Write By the Sea announces 10th anniversary programme
news.summary: Write By the Sea will feature author Claire Keegan for its 10th anniversary festival

news.title: Eddi Reader and The Alan Kelly Gang announce London Irish Cultural Centre gig
news.summary: They will play on September 5 and 6 2025.

news.title: Spinal Tap release new version of 'Stonehenge' featuring Elton John
news.summary: Check out the new music video for 'Stonehenge'  below

news.title: Conor McGregor loses appeal in civil rape case
news.summary: In their ruling this afternoon, the Court of Appeal rejected all grounds of appeal from McGregor.

news.title: Avenue 68 - On Our Radar Q&A: "There’s so much chemistry – and we all leave space for each other to try things"
news.summary: Avenue 68 on turning BIMM jam sessions into a band, debuting at Whelan’s, and their love for D’Angelo.

news.title: ACHES pays homage to GAA Palestine with mural in Dublin
news.summary: "There is no doubt that the Irish people are firmly in support of all Palestinians," said GAA Palestine of the painting.

news.title: South Park sets ratings record with Trump episode
news.summary: South Park's Trump episode brought in 5.9 million viewers in three days

news.title: Jess Glynne slams White House for using her viral "Jet2 holiday" song to promote ICE deportations
news.summary: "My music is about love, unity, and spreading positivity — never about division or hate," Glynne said.
